Polybot Nexus
=======================================

Welcome to the Polybot Nexus Datacenter! To facilitate easy exploration of the Polybot lab data we have developed a set of interactive graphic tools.
Those enable simple interactive exploration of the data in our database. 

.. figure:: _static/polybot_db.png
   :alt: Schematic of the Polybot Data Management System
   :align: center
   :width: 100%

   Schematic of the Polybot pipeline.

Contents:
---------

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Database

   database/literature_data
   database/inhouse_data
